PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-20602002-12-03,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE CHARLES LAPOINTE, P.C., of Montréal, Quebec, to be the Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission to hold office during pleasure for a period of five years, in the place of the Honourable Judd Buchanan.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of the HONOURABLE CHARLES LAPOINTE, P.C., of Montréal, Quebec, to be the Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission to hold office during pleasure for a period of five years, in the place of the Honourable Judd Buchanan.
